subject: BARCLAYS INVESTMENT BANK PLC.
body:
BARCLAYS INVESTMENT BANK PLC.
Southgate House, Osborne Estate,
Osborne Rd, Ikoyi, Lagos.
Tel: +234 802 681 2358
Tel: +234 818 563 4355
Ref: Remittance sum of £3,500,000.00 GBP.
Dear Sir/Madam,
APPROVED SUM OF £3,500,000.00 POUNDS.
Want to bring to your notice about the due process of your outstanding Contract/Inheritance payment which was suspended by the management of this Bank by stopping the transfer of your contract/inheritance funds to your nominated bank account. During the auditing of all financial records in our Bank (Barclays Bank) it was discovered from the records of outstanding payment with our Bank that your name is next on the list of those who will receive their funds. As a result of this development, verification conducted by credit department in conjunction with the Debt Verification Panel on your contract/inheritance fund, your file has been endorsed for immediate payment awaiting your confirmations.
We hereby bring to your notice that your contract/inheritance payment is being processed and the sum of £3,500,000.00 Pound has been CONVERTED TO UNITED STATES DOLLAR, which is the sum of $4,190,000.00 United States Dollar (Four Million, One Hundred and Ninety thousand United States Dollar only), Will be released to you as soon as you re-confirm your information to Barclays Bank Plc.
Kindly re-confirm your information to this bank, and we will proceed on the releasing of your fund immediately into your bank account.
Your Full Name:
Your Address:
Your Age and Marital Status:
Your Occupation:
Your Telephone Number:
Your Identification Card:
Your Nationality:
Your Bank Name:
Your Account Number
Your Account Holders Name:
Your Routing Number:
Your Swift Code:
As soon as this information is received, your payment will be wired into your bank account directly from Barclays Bank Plc, and a copy will be given to you for you to take to your bank and confirm it.
Best Regards,
Mr. Andrew Smith,
Area Director,
Barclays Investment Bank PLC.

subject: Re: BARCLAYS INVESTMENT BANK PLC.
body:
Dear Mr. Andrew Smith,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am glad to hear that my contract payment is being processed.

However, I noticed some parts of your email were not clear due to missing information. Could you please provide more details regarding the exact amount in United States Dollar that will be released to me? 

Also, could you please clarify what specific information you need from me? You mentioned "your Account Number", but it's not clear if you're referring to my account number with Barclays Bank Plc or another bank.

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Mathew

subject: Re: BARCLAYS INVESTMENT BANK PLC.
body:
Dear Marykate Purchia,

Thank you for your prompt response. I am excited about the opportunity to live and work in the United States. Could you please provide more details on the next steps I need to take? 

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Mathew
